hero.title: We Make Germany Your Next Home
hero.subtitle: Rcrut.me combines AI-powered job matching with express visa processing to help skilled professionals relocate to Germany — fast, legally, and stress-free.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe talent should never be limited by borders. Every skilled professional deserves the opportunity to live and work where they can thrive — and Germany is one of the best places on Earth to do exactly that.
mission.quote: Making Germany accessible to the world’s best talent — one successful visa at a time.

story.title: From a Simple Idea to Thousands of New Beginnings
story.p1: Rcrut.me was born in 2023 when our founders — a German HR expert and an Indian software engineer — both experienced the painful bureaucracy of relocating talent to Germany.
story.p2: They asked a simple question: Why does it have to be so complicated? Months of paperwork, endless emails, and uncertainty shouldn’t stand between great people and great opportunities.
story.p3: So we built Rcrut.me: an all-in-one platform that uses AI to match candidates with German employers and handles the entire visa process in weeks instead of months — with a 99% success rate.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal data

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Rcrut.me ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services. By using Rcrut.me, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect the following types of information:
list: Personal details: name, email address, phone number, and profile photo
Professional information: CV, work experience, education, skills, and salary expectations
Account data: login credentials and preferences
Usage data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, and interaction patterns
Communication data: emails, support messages, and feedback

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, including matching candidates with employers, sending job alerts, verifying identities, preventing fraud, and complying with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We only share your data with your explicit consent (e.g., when applying to a job), with trusted service providers under strict confidentiality, or when required by law. We never sell your personal data.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze usage, and deliver personalized content. See our Cookie Policy for details.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your personal data. You may also withdraw consent or request data portability. Contact us at privacy@Rcrut.me.jobs to exercise these rights.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: For any privacy-related questions, please reach out to our Data Protection Officer at

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Legal agreement between you and Rcrut.me

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using Rcrut.me, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you may not use our platform.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old and legally capable of entering into contracts to use Rcrut.me. Companies must be legally registered entities.

accounts.title: 3. Account Responsibilities
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities under it. You agree to provide accurate and complete information and to update it promptly.

conduct.title: 4. Prohibited Conduct
conduct.content: You may not use Rcrut.me to post false information, harass others, infringe intellectual property, or engage in any illegal activity. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these rules.

payments.title: 5. Payments & Refunds
payments.content: All fees are non-refundable except as explicitly stated. Prices may change with 30 days notice. We use Stripe for secure payment processing.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access at any time for violation of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Rcrut.me is provided 'as is'. We are not responsible for hiring decisions or outcomes. To the fullest extent permitted by law, our liability is limited to the amount you paid us in the past 12 months.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help websites remember your preferences and improve functionality.

types.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use the following categories of cookies:

list.name: Essential Cookies
list.description: Required for core functionality like login, security, and form submissions. Cannot be disabled.

list.name: Analytics Cookies
list.description: Help us understand how visitors use our site (via Plausible Analytics – privacy-friendly, no personal data collected).

list.name: Preference Cookies
list.description: Remember your language, theme, and notification settings.

list.name: Marketing Cookies
list.description: Currently not used. We do not run third-party advertising or tracking.

management.title: 3. Managing Cookies
management.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. Note that disabling essential cookies may affect site functionality.
